name: Argent Soul
text: You are a brilliant vessel; you embody hope, joy, and endless confidence, and your presence lifts your allies’ spirits. On the battlefield, you wash away despair, dispel doubt, and fuel your allies’ passions. As an argent soul, you have an uncommonly pure spirit. You see the best in every situation, finding solutions where others find only defeat. Melancholy has no hold on you, for optimism’s light burns away grief. Others find your good nature infectious and strive to rise to your example.

features.restoringCritical(11thLevel): Whenever you score a critical hit with an ardent or an argent soul power, one ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge
features.vitalizingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier
features.argentDevastation(16thLevel): When you attack with an ardent or an argent soul power, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20

flavorText: Despair has no hold when I am near.
